name: Stepping Stones
description:
Stepping Stones is a University of East London group project created by Cold Soup Productions.

Cheat Code: Press W to unlock all levels

Cold Soup Productions

Producer: Leonardo Vieira

Creative Lead: Alexander Willimont

Tech Lead: Ben Tarrant

Stepping Stones Overview:

The player takes on the role of Adyr. Adyr is a quiet and kind member of an ancient tribe he has been sent on a spiritual journey to reach the top of the sacred mountain, a tradition that challenges and transitions all the youth of the ancient tribe into adulthood. Each level is designed to recreate natural environments. The level environments consist of a beach, forest, mountain and an ancient summit. Throughout each level of the game, the player must manipulate the flow of water in order to open doors and unlock paths. The game also offers an indirect and interpretive storytelling experience.
